website_summaries.verdict: Look effortlessly sleek and stylish with the Naturalizer Carly sneaker. Among the many slip-on sneakers available in the market today, this kick appeals to many fans because of its timeless silhouette and durable quality. Not only that but the signature N5 Contour Technology also creates a very comfortable in-shoe feel. So if you are on the lookout for a chic footwear to complete your summer ensemble, then the Carly from Naturalizer is a great fit. Plus, its elevated platform outsole will surely make you stand out in a crowd, literally.
pros: Most of the reviewers mention that the Naturalizer Carly is very comfortable
The stylish design of this sneaker is admired by many wearers
Several owners appreciate the excellent quality of this kick
Many users are happy to recommend the Naturalizer Carly slip-on sneaker to others
A lot of consumers are satisfied with the extra boost in height that they get from this kick
This sneaker is comfortable right out of the box, according to a lot of purchasers
Some of those who already own a pair of this sneaker are willing to buy more in different colors
A good number of sneaker fans agree that this shoe is so versatile it goes well with many summer outfits
The support from this kick is fantastic, according to some
Walking all day in this shoe is not a problem, as mentioned in several Naturalizer Carly reviews
A significant percentage of reviewers are delighted to receive compliments when wearing this kick
Plenty of commenters are glad that this sneaker comes in many color choices
cons: Some wearers notice that this shoe, including its wide version, runs tight
A couple of purchasers mention that they experienced allergic reactions to the size tag inside the shoe

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfortable BUT...
customer_reviews.text: Cute and comfortable shoes! Like most shoes you have to break them in a little bit. They did run on my heels but they seem to be good now. My only complaint is each shoe looks like it’s made of two different leather materials. You can’t tell unless you’re really observing them but one shoe seems cheaper than the other. I hope they last!
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I ordered wide but had to return because it was too tight. I wish it fit because it is really cute
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way.
customer_reviews.text: Love this Naturalizer style. Comfortable all day long & the cut is perfect & not clunky like many others. I own 6 pair. Don’t get the suede Carly’s dirty or wet. They are hard to clean. So I now have some for around the house & others when I go somewhere. The sole is perfect & gives this 64 yr. old gal a boost in height. My most comfy shoe ever!
customer_reviews.author: EL girl

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Narrow
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these, because even ordering them in a 'wide' size was extremely narrow. They felt tighter on the sides of my feet than even regular-width shoes normally do. The length was plenty long, so sizing up would not be a solution. The blush color is great-- it's not an intense pink, but just a shade more pink than beige/tan. The foot bed was very comfortable, and I wish I could keep them but there's no hope of them ever being comfortable for someone with wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Terrific everyday slip on sneaker
customer_reviews.text: As I run between a 7.5 and 8, I ordered both. I also ordered them wide based on reviews. In the end the 7.5 fit best. Their wide does not seem as wide as other brands but worked out for me. The leather is of good quality and the little holes on top of the toe box will keep them well ventilated if you prefer to go sockless.
customer_reviews.author: dcshippy

customer_reviews.title: Fit is a little off.
customer_reviews.text: The fit is a little off. They’re a big tight in the front, but wide at the heel. I don’t have wide or narrow feet-I wear normal width shoes. They are very nice quality and look really nice. I’m just trying to figure out how to wear them and 1-not have them rub the front part of my feet, and 2-keep them from slipping off my heels.
customer_reviews.author: Maria S

customer_reviews.title: Cute comfy shoe
customer_reviews.text: I saw this shoe in TJMaxx but they did not have my size so of course I looked online. I usually order a half size up in this style of shoe and since I had tried a 9 1/2 in store and it was not huge I went with the 8 1/2 (my general size is an 8). Fits well and is comfortable. I'm sure will loosen as I wear them but so have others of this style and they are fine. If you like a snug fit I would order your usual size. If you need a little room I would go the half size up.
customer_reviews.author: ClynthiaD

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: My inserts for plantar fasciitis fit in these and I can where them all day. NOT all naturalizer leather slip ons are equal. Carly is the best for me and my review here.
customer_reviews.author: gogohusky

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely one of the most comfortable shoe you will own.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. One of the Most comfortable shoe and stylish sneakers I have ever owned. Comfortable for walking long distances while traveling while still looking cute. Nice to not fave to wear running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: SUPER CUSHY Yay!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This is a very comfortable shoe, like walking on pillows It was about 1/2 size too small but great price and super cute...will go with shorts, Jean's, cute summer dress.
customer_reviews.author: T S

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoes, just perfect, I’m usually a size 6 I ordered 5.5 and they fit perfect, the quality is great also the leather is amazing very very happy with my purchased.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and comfy...but...
customer_reviews.text: The heel and sides of the shoes are HUGE. I wear a 12W. I never have a problem with shoes being too big, but after a couple of wears I am stepping out of them when I walk. The heel is just too wide.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna B.

customer_reviews.title: WIDES ARE NOT WIDE AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: There is good toe space, but I ordered the WIDE. I received the WIDE. These shoes are NOT wide. They are VERY, very tight exactly where they would need to be wide: right around the widest part of the foot: the ball of the foot.....suuuuuuper tight right there. Incredibly uncomfortable because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Showed up in USED condition!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes showed up used! Super cute shoe but gravely disappointed that they had evident signs of prior use. Dirty sole, scuff marks, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Collins

customer_reviews.title: They seemed like cute and comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 8-8.5 in women sizes. I ordered an 8W and it was too large. I returned and ordered a 7.5W and it was still too large. I sent the item back. They seemed like cute and comfortable shoes!
customer_reviews.author: seamama

customer_reviews.title: I really like the shoes- very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really like the shoes- very comfortable. I did go a 1/2 size smaller than what I normally wear. I got a medium but when i first pt them on thought maybe that was a wrong choice as they were a bit tight. I gave it some time and they stretched out. If I had gone any bigger they wouldn’t have stayed on.
customer_reviews.author: michelle prebble

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes for so many reasons! They are very stylish and on-trend, the blush color is perfect and goes with everything, and they are so much more comfy than I expected! Also they come in a size 4 which can be very difficult to find- especially in a stylish shoe.
customer_reviews.author: emberw

customer_reviews.title: Satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, very comfortable. They have a suede like lining inside, makes them very comfy. They look great. I am very satisfied with this purchase..5 ⭐️ for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: SuzyQ

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: They let some air in and they look and feel great. The leather is soft and fits to my foot well.
customer_reviews.author: Jill_M.

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: They are good except my heel slips on the right shoe and I've tried 3 pair and they all do it.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Kicking myself for buying these
customer_reviews.text: For a shoe that is marketed as being "comfortable", these are not even close. I only wear them because I spent more on them than I normally would a pair of shoes - which would have been worth it had they been supportive and comfortable. The fit is odd (tight around the ball of my foot and loose in the heel), I ordered wide by the way, and there is no arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: nope
customer_reviews.text: this is absolutely not a wide width shoe. its narrow as ever and the opening is way too small.
customer_reviews.author: nhurtado

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Naturalizers! I even purchased these in two different colors. I wear them almost every day to work. They are very comfortable to wear while being on your feet for a majority of the day.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Just the right color!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are picture perfect and great quality for the price. I will shop this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Swag'smom

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! They are very comfortable! I can wear them all day without any rubbing or blisters. I would highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking summer shoe. Fit was good for me. Padding in shoe is good.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Blue

customer_reviews.title: Run big
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are super comfortable but they run a big. Buy half size down.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Elena Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Bought several
customer_reviews.text: A little narrow but they fit well, great with leggings and for replacing my flip flops as it gets colder
customer_reviews.author: K. Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: If you have sore feet get these.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfy. I have 3 jobs so they help so my feet don't hurt all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Wells

customer_reviews.title: Comfort for all day support
customer_reviews.text: Recommend these shoes in wide for anyone who suffers from bunions! I can get away with wearing these at the office and then transition into my weekend wear! I have black and would love to grab a second pair in a lighter color! (Review from a woman)
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and look great too, which doesn’t happen often
customer_reviews.author: kitty

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Comfortable (after the breaking in period) and cute! I always get tons of compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Amazing comfortable shoes , I love them totally recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Weird sizing
customer_reviews.text: I really like the color and the material, but I was disappointed about the sizing, I had to ordered 3 pairs to finally find my size, overall I'm pleased that Amazon could returned all my items
customer_reviews.author: Maria L Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes for everyday wear. They would be great for travel as they would be easy to slip on and off for TSA at airports.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Storey

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: There isn’t any arch support, but the shoes are well made and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: David Bigelow

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe! Runs a little big though
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy!!! Great quality. I usually wear a 7 and the 6.5 fits me good. I would go down 1/2 a size. Especially if you are going to wear them without socks!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Really like these! Cute and comfortable. I didn’t find them too narrow like other reviews and don’t think I have particularly narrow feet - they are average width!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Hawthorn

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Excellent walking shoe and more stylish looking than other slip-ons. Very comfortable after being broken in.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra James

customer_reviews.title: Wrong shoe size
customer_reviews.text: Gave wrong size box says right size but shoes wrong size. Bought again hope it does not do that again.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Cuuuute
customer_reviews.text: Normally a 6 and wide. But I got a 6 and it fit tight but after one wear it loosens. No need for the wide size. Love them and also ordered in burgundy!
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, cute, good support for foot issues. Good for fall/in-between.
customer_reviews.author: Twila Wilt

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and style
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love naturalizer shoes, extremely comfy and true to width, able to wear these all day without having achy feet.
customer_reviews.author: AynaD

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and good looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very comfortable shoe and doesn’t rub in the back.
customer_reviews.author: aripp

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: This brand is just perfect, is súper comfortable, perfect for a long day standing.
customer_reviews.author: Paola Colina

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, comfortable shoes. Will probably buy other colors as well. My feet are broader in the front so the Wide works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Abhi

customer_reviews.title: Loved but Returned
customer_reviews.text: Returned because they were so narrow even though i ordered a wide
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: The shoe looks just as it does in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe very comfortable fits as expected just a little tight in the toy area but it gives after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Katya Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Width does not fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a wide width and usually that gives me plenty of room for socks, but these are very narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Lori W

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable slip on sneaker I have ever tried on! A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a comfortable and cute shoe! I feel like I’m walking on cushions!
customer_reviews.author: MsFancyInSD

customer_reviews.title: The shoe is tight!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was so tight, It was painful. I’ve worn this brand of shoe before with no problem so I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Edward L.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy, best of worn with a no show sock!
customer_reviews.author: jessica crusham

customer_reviews.title: It's tooo Narrow ☹
customer_reviews.text: I like this shoe, but it's not a wide with for me I wear a 12 wide.
customer_reviews.author: Azena R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome comfort and support
customer_reviews.text: I love this “Vans style” slip on! Way more comfortable than Vans! Being Naturizer, the quality is top-notch and built for arch support and comfort. I want to buy these in every color. I especially like the perforations on the top. Ventilation is good. Only one con for me is That it runs big. I’ll buy a half-size or one size smaller next time. But it’s not a deal breaker for me. I wear them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Kassi M

product_meta.title: Naturalizer Women's Carly Sneaker, Black Leather, 5 UK
product_meta.description: Retro twin-gore with perfed detail will have you jumping for joy, while Naturalizer N5 contour provides all the additional comfort and support that you need.
feature_bullets: Comfort & support for all day comfort
